overview: In order to ensure the safe transfer of large troops and villagers, the newly arrived deputy commander of the military sub-district Li Zhiyuan (played by Li Youbin) and battalion commander Lu Tianze (played by Wang Tao), company commander Huang Changjun (played by Jiang Shui) and other soldiers led all the generals, with Majiapu as the blocking position, and the villager Liu Haijing (played by Shi Lanya) family compound as the blocking point, desperately blocking the heroic story of the Japanese army.
title: Blasting
